title: Ant and Dec's adorable reaction to BGT's Twist and Pulse over I'm A Celebrity surprise
text:

Britain's Got Talent: The Champions finalists Twist and Pulse were back at it with the hilarious nods to different shows and tunes during their latest performance.

There was even a throwback to a Love Island recoupling, with the familiar theme song and fire pit backdrop.

But one show got a louder cheer than the rest, and the higher squeals came from none other than presenters Ant McPartlin and Dec Donnelly.

Mid-way through the act, Twist and Pulse dancers Ashley and Glen were suddenly stood in front of a jungle backdrop as the familiar I'm A Celebrity tune played.

(Image: ITV)

As the audience roared, the camera suddenly panned over to Ant and Dec who were jumping in the air.

Raising their hands in the air, both men were heard shouting: "Yeah!"

Ashley and Glen, meanwhile, were having a fake punch-up.

(Image: ITV)

The audience were loving it, as the judges were also in hysterics, and they weren't the only ones.

Viewers at home raced to Twitter over the scenes and Ant and Dec's reactions.

One viewer commented: "That millisecond long Ant and Dec moment made me cry, it was so adorable."

(Image: ITV)

Another said: "Ant and Dec are the cutest human beings to ever set foot on earth. Try Change my mind."

A third was just as excited as the hosts, and tweeted: "IM A CELEB MUSIC JUST MADE ME SO SO EXCITED I SCREAMED S**T THE BED AM SO BUZZING."

Meanwhile a fourth said: "The I’m A Celeb bit has sold me!"

Britain's Got Talent returns in 2020.
description: The Britain's Got Talent: The Champions hosts couldn't contain themselves when their jungle series got a mention
